ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... is ... a ... [SNIP] Bah!! I ve run thru at night SEVERAL times and have had NO problem whatsoever. Didn t even see anything to sneeze at and I m only a L19
ygData.messageBody:
> Try it at night - you won't live to reach the other side of the zone. It
is
> full of high level undead (30 to 45+) and things like enraged dread wolves
> and nearly all of it casts nasty spells and has a huge aggro radius - it's
a
> BLAST!
>
[SNIP]

Bah!! I've run thru at night SEVERAL times and have had NO problem
whatsoever. Didn't even see anything to sneeze at and I'm only a L19 bard.
Maybe it depends HOW you run thru? I usually take the wall/zone edge that
goes directly left coming out of HH, where you pass Rivervale zonepoint and
can get to WC zonepoint in a jiffy... Maybe that's why I didn't see
anything?? Does anyone have any specific "Norrath TIME" on when those
baddies spawn besides just saying "nighttime" ??

Mi'lady Brangwen, L19, The Rathe
